features: Super Soft Material: The top layer of our beige area rug is full of furry velvet, its silky smooth texture gives you the softest touch- the inter-layer of fluffy carpets is designed with a thick sponge to give you warmth and keep you away from the chill floor.

Non-Slip Design: We added a non-slip design on the back of shag rug, the small PVC anti-skid points will prevent the plush rug from sliding on the floor- in order to keep the tan rug in place as much as possible, make sure the floor is clean and dry.

Compatible Decor: Pacapet fluffy rug is a good choice to add extra colors to your room-each shaggy rug with a simple design in solid color, different colors are suitable for various occasions. It can be perfectly compatible with girl and boy room, or be used as bedroom rugs, living room rugs, kids room rug, nursery rugs and dorm room rugs ect.

All of our bedroom carpet is made of good materials, which is not fade and skin friendly- Furry rug is odor free, kids will love to lay on it, or run their hands through it and enjoy super soft feeling.

Easy to Clean: Please try to use a low-power handheld vacuum to clean the dirty things on the surface of throw rugs, for deep cleaning, hands wash it with low temperature water and gentle detergent- after washing, please air dry or hang to dry.
body.description: Pacapet Modern Fluffy Area Rug Luxurious tone and soft touch, this rug from Pacapet is an excellent choice for home decor. Fluffy long pile velvet and simple solid color work with a wide variety of room. We provide different colors and sizes so that you can choose the most suitable home decoration carpet. The long pile of our rug is made of synthetic polyester which boast with unparalleled softness and warmth. No animal fur is used， We would never hurt our little furry friend. The rug is vacuum-packed, there may be wrinkles when first opened, please don't worry, it will recover within 1-2 days. The rug cannot be machine washed, you can try to use a low-power handheld vacuum or hands wash, please air dry or hang to dry.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Over 10 Years of Excellence in Home Rugs We are committed to bringing warmth to every family with our premium product！ Perfect Decor Practical Function Preeminent Quality Pacapet Modern Fluffy Area Rug Luxurious tone and soft touch, this rug from Pacapet is an excellent choice for home decor. Fluffy long pile velvet and simple solid color work with a wide variety of room. We provide different colors and sizes so that you can choose the most suitable home decoration carpet. The long pile of our rug is made of synthetic polyester which boast with unparalleled softness and warmth. No animal fur is used， We would never hurt our little furry friend. The rug is vacuum-packed, there may be wrinkles when first opened, please don't worry, it will recover within 1-2 days. The rug cannot be machine washed, you can try to use a low-power handheld vacuum or hands wash, please air dry or hang to dry.

Soft Shaggy Rug This shag carpet surface is made of the soft synthetic microfiber, its silky smooth texture gives you the softest touch, stepping barefoot on it is as soft as stepping on a cloud. You will indulge in its softness and warmth. Long Pile Area Rug Surface 30mm long velvet and 10mm sponge interlayer is not only given a soft feeling but also keep your feet from the cold floor, You’ve truly never experienced a rug like this before! Anti-Skid Backing Numerous tiny, durable PVC anti-skid points will prevent the carpet from sliding on the floor. In order to keep the carpet in place as much as possible, make sure the floor is clean and dry. Nature and Safe Rug All of our area rugs are made of nature materials, which provide great fade resistant and skin friendly, it's odor free, very suitable for your lively baby and active pets, let them roll and play on the fuzzy carpet freely!

reviews.reviewText: Doesn't have non-slip backing on it. May want to invest in some tape to keep it stationary. Super soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The rig is worth the money rice, so far it’s been good quality and the color was pretty. However, it’s not as thick or cushioned as I thought it would be. But it is serving its purpose. I have hardwood flooring in my room and I don’t like my feet being cold in the morning when I wake up. The size was really good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.reviewText: So basically, this is one of my cats best friend, but more on that later.This rug is just so fantastic. I bought the white which I was worried I would regret having 3 cats, one dog, and living in the country so dirt roads and what not. But it hasn't been bad keeping it clean. Leaves are harder to get all the bits out of it when they have traveled inside on my dog. Its not hard to vacuum though I do have a cordless Dyson and the model I have is much less power than my corded shark vacuum. I do need to anchor down the side not under the couch so it doesn't get sucked up.There is a delightful amount of cushion to this rug. I can see how it would be perfect for a baby to play on.But here is where I am so extra impressed. So I know the seller said to not wash this rug. Well one of my cats had diarrhea on it. Yup diarrhea on a white rug the horror. Even worse we saw it just before going to work and we have been doing almost 60 hour work weeks during this holiday peak time. So we threw it downstairs in the laundry room and forgot about it. And not just for a day but like a week and a half..... so this diarrhea was fully crusted on. At this point a spot cleaning would not do. Also its winter and 20 degrees out so washing with a hose wasn't going to work either. I was worried the rug would be a goner. I decided to just go ahead and wash it. We ended up putting it in the dryer which perhaps we should have let it just air dry. We did put it on low heat.Well all of the diarrhea washed out and there is no sign or indication it was ever there. Now the downside is that now the top layer is loose from the cushion and from the bottom part so they don't necessarily move as one now. So when my cat plays on it and grips her nails into it the fluffy part comes up but the rest stays down so then I have to shake it a bit to get it to lay flat again. But I'm not taking any stars off because I washed the rug which we were told not to do. I do have a feeling it would have not done that had had we just let it air dry. But it just lays a bit off now. I'm just so thrilled I washed it and everything came off.Now, here is the best thing about the rug. Our one cat is OBSESSED WITH IT. I low key wonder if its like filled with catnip or something. I didnt realize how much until we had forgotten about it in the basement and finally got it washed and back upstairs. She will rug and tackle the rug, cuddle it, roll around like she is hopped up on something. We got her a super cool moving fish toy and she was like nah, but this rug is her favorite thing besides us and food.I am totally going to get a bigger one for our other family room. I wish there was a brown option.I am not recommending you wash this rug. But I am saying if you end up doing so, perhaps don't put it in the dryer. It definitely lays differently than it did before.
